item.description:
This week we will be discussing the topic of non-judgment, and how it is a cornerstone of mindfulness practice. When we can begin to see things as they are, including the commentary from our conditioned thinking, we can experience the judging mind that keeps us in a place of non-acceptance. Otherwise known as equanimity, or seeing all things equally, non-judgment gives us a way to meet the world, and be with others, in a way that inspires presence and greater acceptance.

Come join us for our weekly gathering. The meeting will include several shorter meditations (15-20 minutes each) and discussion. All levels are welcome, please join us on Monday evening for mindful community.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting people at the door until 6pm
item.name: Weekly Meetup- Non-Judgment
